name: Orbital Ace
description:
Orbital Ace is a 2D arena shooter in space. Your goal as ace is to survive as long as possible with the highest score while being chase downed by a fleet of enemy ships. Currently only 4 types of ship are tracking you down. The Soldiers, The Scouts, The Snipers, and the worst of all The Mother Ship. Best of luck People don't last after 10 minutes of being tracked, So ... can you survive?

[W,A,S,D] to move

[Esc] to go to the menu

[F] toggle Fullcreen

Left click is to interact and aim & shoot
